main: When his passive is active, inflicts {status:ConcentratedAttackMeursault} on the specific attack slot targeted. Successive turns attacking the same slot increases the stack of this status, which gives him Base and/or Coin Power as the stack increases and causes his S3 to generate additional {status:Breath} and deal more damage. Applying the debuff on another target or attack slot causes the previous instance to expire. Having someone else apply another instance of Focused Attack also causes it to expire.

If his target has 15+ Potency and 3+ Count of {status:Burst}, his skills stop inflicting {status:Burst} but also stops consuming {status:Burst} Count when triggering it. His S2 also deals additional crit damage instead for each {status:Burst} it would have inflicted.
other: All of his skills generate {status:Breath} which gives him {status:Agility} every turn if his passive is active, helping him with his skills' Power conditionals since they're all reliant on his speed difference from his target's.
S3 is reused against a random target if its last coin kills its target or destroys a part.

1051101.desc:
Gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 3 [Breath] Potency on self at Turn End (max 2)
On Hit with base Attack Skills: inflict [ConcentratedAttackMeursault] next turn. (once per Skill)
1051101.name: Duel Livestream

1051111.desc:
Gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 3 [Breath] Potency on self at Turn End (max 2)
On Hit with base Attack Skills: inflict [ConcentratedAttackMeursault] next turn. (once per Skill)
If this unit attacked the Slot with [ConcentratedAttackMeursault] and defeated its owner or broke the Part, heal 7 SP
1051111.name: Duel Livestream

1051121.desc: The fastest ally, on Clash Win, gains 1 [Agility] next turn (2 times per turn)
1051121.name: One Step Ahead

data.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Potency with its effects, but does not consume [Burst] Count On Hit
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
